name: Damnation of Oryx
description:
Damnation of Oryx is an action game with roguelite elements made for the Ludum Dare 51. You play as a brother infected by an unknown corruption trying save his sister from a monstrous cult. Use your difformed arm as a grappling hook to climb walls, kill your enemies, unlock upgrades and manage the curses afflicting you to escape this hell. Easy? Keep in mind you only have 10 seconds to finish each room before becoming a monster yourself...

Controls
Move - WASD / ZQSD / Left Stick
Jump - A / Spacebar
Hook - LB / Right click
Attack - X / Left click

Damnation of Oryx has been made by: 
Adam Aubart
Eloïse Zirotti 
Remi Logez
Remy Masselot
Gabin Bastard
Matteo Benaissa
Iris Pecquet
Robin Six
Simon Walenczak
for Ludum Dare #51, as an Extra Submission.
